reviews.review: Если вы любите телепортироваться то самое то !

cara,jogo feito pela valve,claro que é bom.

puzzles que sao facil e dificil ao mesmo tempo

trilha sonora do caramba(a musiquinha do fim,ahh glados ahh)

e a historia,NOSSA SINHORA que delicia

e nao pode esquecer da GLaDOS,sinceramente,eu tenho a sindrome de estocolmo com ela.

o modo coop,ou melhor,modos coops incrivels,tanto a historia dos robos quanto aquela maratona com seu amigo.(dar pra se divertir ate sozinho,como eu no caso hihihihi '-')

se tiver um amigo que sua amizade seja mutua,horas de diversao.(nao fique com raiva do seu amigo caso ele nao saiba a soluçao,se voce nao sabe tambem pora.to put*:/ )

enfim,eu recomendo muito.tanto sozinho,tanto com um amigo.

(eu queria tanto jogar com ela,mas isso nao vai acontecer,eu me permito apenas ve-los se divertir.
e naquele dia,esse presente me permitiu falar com ela so mais um pouquinho).adnan

Sencillamente buenisimo y la forma en que se complica las pruebas hace que quieras mas niveles.
Ademas que la historia esta bastante bien trabajada y es muy interesante.
非常有趣味性，解密还行，让人沉迷
相当良心的场景塑造，优秀的BGM和剧情，带你进行一场前所未有的时空旅行，揭开老光圈实验室的神秘面纱

Хотел купить Postal, купил Portal. Нисколько не пожалел. 

10 говорящих картофелин из 10
有没有人一起玩啊，加我好友一起快活啊！！！

Really great game.  Holds up notably well years after its release.  Gameplay is refined, story is varied and interesting, and the voice acting and graphics are superb.

There are so many puzzles, but unique and different enough to not be too repetitive.  Compared to the original Portal, very few of the puzzles felt cheap or excessively opaque / tricky - lots of satisfaction when you figure one out!

Be warned, after playing this game you will have dreams about placing orange and blue portals, crazy side-effect of playing!
Это Valve. Это Source. Это Portal... Этим всё сказано...

i gave 2 pc i can't pay in 1 pc one dose work idk why?
it say it need steam need to run to start the game

I have over 150 hours on this game at the time of writing this, and I can say that even after 9 years this game has remained amazing and fun. Even when the main story is over you can keep playing with your friends in co-op! Last but not least, you can play tests created by the community, tests are still being made today and you can make your own with your own infinite creativity! in summary this game remains relevant and fun  to this day, I would recommend this game to anyone. 10/10
超好玩，双人合作趣味指数增加~
En mi mas sincera opinion, el mejor juego de Valve
Do I really have to tell you? This is the greatest game in the universe. Now take those lemons and get mad.
One of the most uncanny and amazing story! Graphics much ahead of its time, Great sound design, and the GLaDOS just couldn't be more perfect.
Легче пройти dark souls, чем сделать анимацию в co-op)
Although the graphics aren't the best nowadays, the game-play far surpasses any modern-day game. Most fun I've had playing a game in years.

Игра очень сложная для моего мировозрения. В игре я играл в мультиплеер и понял, что наша жизнь безcмыслина без головоломок, ведь что мы будем делать, если в жизни у нас будет тупизна. Все будут играть в кс го, и будут писать эти ваши обзоры. Я однажды потерял семью не решив головоломку........ 10 извилин из 10(

👍/ из 5

Причина: 
1-я: Мой "Друг" сказал что игра отстой, а я с ним согласен!
2-я: Ненавижу головоломки!
honestly the dialogue is just comedy gold and overall great game
I have bought this game like 3 times now

I played Portal 2 on my Xbox 360 a long time ago, and I easily put in over two hundred hours going through the campaign again and again, and playing the co-op campaign with my brother several times. This Steam version is updated and has even more content to enjoy with the Level Editor! Portal 2 is one of my favorite video games of all-time. You will love this game!
Portal with more stuff. Triple thumbs up
consigliatissimo, non per tutti, originale, invecchia benissimo

I played portal 2 on Xbox 360 first, and i completed it 100%, and it was an absolutely amazing game. I got it here during the winter 2019 sale, and by god, it holds up! If you're into puzzle games with cool weird mechanics, this is for you!

This is my favorite game EVER! Even in 2020, the graphics impress me (sorta). The story is worthy of a feature film and wraps you in, The characters are strong and well cut out. Multiplayer is good. A no brainer for a price of 9.99. GET IT!
Story solid 9/10 co-op 10/10 makes you feel smarter than you actually are which is what i like :)
i like this game its really good wow

MAGNIFICO!!! 

Como no 1, você entra com 85QI e sai com +150QI. Saiba esse jogo não é para os fracos. 

Jogue e faça amizade com a bolinha do olho azul falante
Мне не нравится игра из-за того, что меня оскорбляет какая-то шлюха, мы её не видим, но слышим во время игры. Она унижает меня морально.

Very fun with friends in co-op mode.
Buy this if you intend to play with friends because single player can feel quite boring on your own.

Portal 2
Bought it on sale for only 0.89$.
So far I've only played a little bit but I still wanted to give my opinion right now. The game is already 8 years old now and it's not getting younger but the grafics of the game are still okay. The stroy so far is also very nice. The game has a rather sad/creepy/eary mood. The music is also rather dark. It's not exactly a horror game but you have to like that kind of stuff in order for you to appreciate it. Other than it it is basically a puzzle game. I haven't explored any of the co-op stuff. But I think for the single player mode alone it's worth it.

To summarize:

I would recomend this game if you are into Puzzle games and maybe also if you like 'darker' games.
Especially if it's on sale, buy it!
es entretenido y te hace pensar
